choices.C: It acts as the main voltage supply to the motherboard and processor
choices.B: It provides power to the audio and sound boards of the machine
choices.A: It allows peripherals to draw power when the machine is off
choices.D: It powers all expansion cards and external device hubs

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the main purpose of the +5VSB output of a power supply?

comments.content: Thanks for sharing! If anyone is interested in reading more, you can control F for "5VSB" in this Wikipedia page : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Power_supply_unit_(computer)
